title: The Daoist Seal - Novel Updates
tags: Arrogant Characters   Buddhism   Cultivation   Fast Cultivation   Male Protagonist   Orphans   Righteous Protagonist   Romantic Subplot   Transmigration
author: Sleepyhead Dragon   贪睡的龙
description: This world has never had gods, only people with strength. Jiang Xiaofan was originally a mortal until he chanced upon a fragment of the Daoist Seal and began practicing the teachings of two ancient, sacred Buddhist and Daoist texts. As he journeys across Ziwei and traverses the galaxy, the seal inside him will be a testament to his path of greatness.>
